plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green, but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water to grow.
☀️ I stand outside.
🌳 I can be big or small.

plant.question: I am a seed in a pod. You can eat me when I'm green, and I’m good with ham! What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often round and small.
🥄 You might eat me with a spoon.
🥣 I'm a vegetable.

plant.question: I am red, round, and grow on a vine. You can make sauce or juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 People use me on pasta.
🔴 I grow in gardens.
☀️ I love the sun.

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍃 I change colors in the fall in some places.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I have a bright yellow head and follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name tells you what I like.
💛 I can grow very tall.
🛢️ My seeds can be pressed to make oil.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👓 They say I am good for your eyesight.
🐰 Bugs Bunny likes to eat me

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful fragrant flowers. People often give me as a gift. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, but come in other colours.
💘 People give me to people they love
🥀 Be careful when you hold me!

plant.question: I have prickly skin and juicy fruit inside. I grow in warm climates. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I am not very cuddly.
🏜️ I can live in a desert.
💧 I store lots of water.

plant.question: I am a tall grass that grows in fields. My grains are used to make bread and other foods. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 Farmers grow me.
🍞 I am harvested
🐥 Animals and people eat me.

plant.question: I grow from a bulb and bloom in the spring. I am often associated with the Netherlands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I come in many colors.
🇳🇱 You can find fields of me in Holland
👑 I have a distinct cup shape.

food.question: I am yellow, you peel me, monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a fruit.
💛 My skin is often this color.
〰️ You need to take off my outside to eat me inside.

food.question: I am white and fluffy, I taste good with butter or jam. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am made from wheat.
🔥 I am usually cooked.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am round and orange, rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🌱 I grow underground.
🐰 I am good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am cold and sweet, and come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a dessert.
☀️ I am perfect for a hot day.
👅 You can eat me from a cone or a cup.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I can be green or gold inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a vine.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon when I am ripe.
🇨🇳 I originally came from China.

food.question: I am made from milk, but I am hard. You can grate me on pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from an animal.
🍕 I am often on pizza.
🐭 Mice are often associated with me.

food.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I come from a plant.
🔥 I need heat to change form.
🍿 I am often covered in butter and salt.

food.question: I'm a drink made from squeezing a fruit. I'm often served at breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am often a citrus fruit.
☀️ I am a common morning beverage.
🍹 I am a type of juice.

food.question: I am a long green vegetable, often pickled. People eat me on sandwiches. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a type of gourd.
🥪 I often accompany deli meats.
💧 I am often preserved in vinegar.

food.question: I am a food made from fermented cabbage. I am often eaten in Germany. What am I?

hints.text: 🇩🇪 I am a popular side dish in Germany.
🥬 I am made from a leafy green vegetable.
⏳ I require a long time to prepare.
